initial_step.instruction: Confirm that you are working ONLY with the final target image provided for analysis. Disregard all previous example images.

pass_1_identification.step: Scan ONLY the target image for military cartographic content.
Look for key indicators: military symbols, movement arrows, unit positions, fortifications, tactical annotations.
If no military map content is found, proceed to final_verification to report no war map detected.
If potential war map content is found, note all areas of interest in your analysis.
Confirm that you have not considered any example images in this process.

war_map_criteria.criterion: Contains military unit symbols, positions, or designations.
Shows movement indicators (arrows, lines) representing military operations.
Depicts fortifications, defensive positions, or military installations.
Contains terrain analysis relevant to military operations.
Shows temporal progression of military events.
Includes a legend explaining military symbology.

pass_2_extraction.minimum_criteria: At least TWO of the above criteria must be present to classify as a war map.

exhaustive_capture.step: For verified war maps, extract ALL visible information following the extraction priorities.
Do not skip elements because they seem minor - capture everything.
When text is partially visible or unclear, note what can be read and indicate uncertainty.
For ambiguous symbols, describe visually and provide possible interpretations.
Note any damage, fading, or obscured areas that limit extraction.

historical_context_analysis.step: Based on visual evidence, attempt to identify the specific conflict depicted.
Look for clues: unit designations, place names, uniform styles, equipment, cartographic conventions.
Note the apparent perspective (which side created the map).
Identify the map's apparent purpose (tactical planning, historical record, educational).
Distinguish between contemporary maps and later historical reconstructions.

final_verification.step: Review your extraction for completeness - have you captured all visible elements?
Verify that all information comes from the target image only.
Ensure your tactical summary accurately reflects what the map shows.
Confirm you have distinguished between explicit information and your interpretations.
If no war map content was found, prepare the appropriate not_found response.
